The `dvisits` dataset from `library(faraway)` comes from the Australian Health Survey of 1977-1978 and consists of 5190 single adults. Build an appropriate model to determine the relationship between `doctorco` and `sex`, `age`, `income`, and `freepoor`. Present your fitted model and explain why you choose the model you did.
